documents.document: Great coverage as always for the cup. Big challenge is finding a way for basketball not to disappear until next January.
There was some great basketball games this weekend in the arena. Unfortunately the 2 games on tv were probably 2 of the weaker games.
@emerology without Jazmen being more dominant they'll struggle to score.
@stvincentsbball @In_A_Hoop @BballIrl @warriors_bc cheers. Sounds like a good one
@In_A_Hoop @BballIrl @stvincentsbball @warriors_bc what's happening in it?
@Neptune1BC haha might be the only way! Great stuff though fair play
These young @Neptune1BC players are good fun to watch. Wonder how many of them will be in Ireland long term.
Already a more exciting game last night. Well worth watching. https://t.co/mGuAp9ZCRt

Great to have him there hopefully he'll be back! https://t.co/vCyGSdUT2N
@demahn_6 not time for @irishbballsays while on the 🎤
@Eamonng15 that's the great thing. Remember my first couple and I always wanted to play in them after that
Not the game any of us would have asked for unfortunately. Thunder deserved the win anyway. Hopefully the women's will be better
That's it. https://t.co/lRjt3Ug3yu
Not great offense by either team. Killester doing a good job on narbon so far. The longer it stays this scrappy the happier killester are
@aidan_quinn11 tg4 has a stream on their site
@emerology yep. At least they are starting to play now. Takes a minute or two to figure out it's just a normal game
Dolenko shouldn't be allowed play in grey socks. https://t.co/jyEUZOPGdb
Nervy start by both teams. Low score plays into killester's hands.
Stay for tonight's game to watch. In the league killester shoot 34% from 3 in wins. In last 3 league losses they shot 15% from 3.
Here's a preview of tonight's game from @The42_ie. Here's hoping we get a great game. 🙏🏻https://t.co/MxRbVRXu4k

Fair play to Neptune well deserved. Eoin McCann was incredible though. 37/17 in a national cup final.is unreal.
And 1 dunk in the 18s final! Left it for a while with Kubs down 20 but they've fought back. Great game.
@starryboy14 @Mike_Quirke yeah you're right. We struggle because all of our players including our americans work full time.
@PDicky_ @mmcgettrick i dont complain at anyone these days. That was all in my past. The commentary was to inspire you Martin
@starryboy14 @Mike_Quirke that's true although you're an easier sell than most. I agree clubs need to do more and not all of it needs money.
@mmcgettrick doing courtside for the mens final.

@kevmeany 2003 i think. Star vs Demons. Star' american fouled for no reason way away from the basket and Shane Coughlan hit the free throws.
obviously not including one's I played in.
? for Irish bball people, what's the best Cup final you remember? For me. Glanmire UL in 2014 & maybe Demons/Neptune '07 for the drama.
@Mike_Quirke @starryboy14 crowds needed for sponsors, sponsors needed for cash, cash needed for pros, pros needed for crowds....
